controller

Class DragAndDropManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DragAndDropManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryDragAndDropManager, PrimaryDragAndDropManager, UnaryDragAndDropManager

    public abstract class DragAndDropManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    florian campanella, Thomas Rambaldi, Nicolas Leotier gestion du drag and drop avec une classe abstraite DragAndDropManager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DragAndDropManager(javafx.scene.Group group)
      Constructeur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDragAndDropEvent()
      function for called every Drag and Drop methodes
      abstract void onDragDetected()
      defines a function to be called when drag gesture has been detected.
      abstract void onDragDone()
      defines a function to be called when this node is a drag and drop gesture source after its data has been droped on a drop target.
      abstract void onDragDropped()
      Defines a function to be called when the mouse button is released on this node during drag and drop gesture.
      abstract void onDragEntered()
      defines a function to be called when drag gesture enters this node
      abstract void onDragExited()
      defines a function to be called when drag gesture exits this node
      abstract void onDragOver()
      defines a function to be called when drag gesture progresses within this node

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • onDragDetected

        public abstract void onDragDetected()
        defines a function to be called when drag gesture has been detected. this is the rigth place to start drag and drop operation.

      • onDragOver

        public abstract void onDragOver()
        defines a function to be called when drag gesture progresses within this node

      • onDragEntered

        public abstract void onDragEntered()
        defines a function to be called when drag gesture enters this node

      • onDragExited

        public abstract void onDragExited()
        defines a function to be called when drag gesture exits this node

      • onDragDropped

        public abstract void onDragDropped()
        Defines a function to be called when the mouse button is released on this node during drag and drop gesture.

      • onDragDone

        public abstract void onDragDone()
        defines a function to be called when this node is a drag and drop gesture source after its data has been droped on a drop target.

      • onDragAndDropEvent

        public void onDragAndDropEvent()
        function for called every Drag and Drop methodes
